Description:

My entry for #LOWREZJAM 2022, HATMiN.

It's a work in progress at the moment. A 2022 redo of my unfinished 2016 attempt but this time no Unity. It's build from scratch in a custom pixel engine on top of SDL.

This will soon be replaced with a better description but for now here's a list of its current features:

  • Animation
  • Player movement
  • Palette swapping
  • Wandering NPC AI
  • Shooting
  • Collision
  • Tile / level loading
  • Outfit palettes
  • Target Polaroid / info folder
  • Win conditions
  • Menus / Level selection / Progress

And some things on my TODO list:

  • Palette generation
  • Item pickups
  • Hostile guards
  • AI fleeing
  • Scoring system
  • Secondary objectives
  • Other weapons

Instructions:

  • Move with [W A S D]
  • Shoot with [SPACE]
  • Look at Target photo with [TAB]
  • Exit level at checkered flag.
  • Access menu with [ESC]
